Index.meta_title: Jibhi.ai — Plan your dream trip, instantly. AI-powered, fully personal travel concierge for city travelers.
Index.meta_description: Jibhi.ai is your AI travel planner: build custom itineraries, book everything, and get 24/7 support. Trusted by travelers in Mumbai, Dubai, and SF.

Hero.title: Your dream trip, booked while you sleep.
Hero.description: AI-powered trip planning and booking in minutes. No stress, no info overload. Just pure anticipation.

Features.section_description: Describe your trip. AI plans while you sleep. Book in one tap.
Features.feature1_description: No templates or generic plans. Every itinerary is crafted for you.
Features.feature2_description: AI does all the research. You save days of scrolling and stressing.
Features.feature3_description: All bookings, confirmations, and custom picks—in one click.

FAQ.faq1_q: How is Jibhi different from MakeMyTrip or Booking.com?
FAQ.faq1_a: Jibhi plans and books your entire trip, 100% personalized, in minutes. No generic results, no info overload.
FAQ.faq2_q: Can I trust AI to make bookings for me?
FAQ.faq2_a: Yes. Jibhi only books via trusted partners and shows you every detail before you confirm.
FAQ.faq3_q: What if I want to change or cancel a booking?
FAQ.faq3_a: You’re always in control. Modify or cancel easily—our team and smart AI are here to help.
FAQ.faq4_q: Do I need to pay to try Jibhi?
FAQ.faq4_a: No credit card needed. Planning is 100% free. Pay only if you book.
FAQ.faq5_q: Will I get support if I’m stuck abroad?
FAQ.faq5_a: Absolutely. Jibhi is always your travel ally—24/7 support via WhatsApp, chat, or call.
FAQ.faq6_a: Yes. We use bank-grade security. Your info is never sold or shared.

CTA.title: Ready for your next adventure?
CTA.description: Join 1,200+ travelers who plan smarter with Jibhi.
